RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT CCY_CODE,CCY_NAME FROM CYTM_CCY_DEFN WHERE RECORD_STAT='O'
SELECT COUNTRY_CODE, DESCRIPTION FROM STTMS_COUNTRY WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL', 'ALL COUNTRIES' FROM DUAL
SELECT CUSTOMER_NO, SHORT_NAME FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL','ALL CUSTOMERS' FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNTRY_CODE, DESCRIPTION FROM STTMS_COUNTRY WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' UNION SELECT 'ALL','ALL COUNTRIES' FROM DUAL
SELECT CUST_GROUP,CUST_GROUP_DESC FROM OLTM_CUST_GROUP WHERE RECORD_STAT = 'O' AND AUTH_STAT = 'A' AND CUST_GROUP_TYPE = 'T' UNION SELECT 'ALL' , 'ALL CUSTOMER GROUPS' FROM DUAL

RAD_DATASOURCES.RELATION_WITH_PARENT: TXTMS_RULE_HISTORY.RULE_CODE=TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.RULE_CODE AND TXTMS_RULE_HISTORY.EFFECTIVE_DATE=TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.EFFECTIVE_DATE ANDTATMS_RULE_HISTORY.COUNTRY=TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.COUNTRY ANDTATMS_RULE_HISTORY.CUSTOMER=TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.CUSTOMER AND TXTMS_RULE_HISTORY.CUST_TAX_GROUP=TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.CUST_TAX_GROUP ANDTATMS_RULE_HISTORY.CURRENCY = TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.CURRENCY AND TXTMS_RULE_HISTORY.NATIONALITY = TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.NATIONALITY ANDTATMS_RULE_HISTORY.VERSION_NO = TXTMS_SLAB_HISTORY.VERSION_NO
